    • Constructor Detail

      • EducationalCompany

        public EducationalCompany(java.lang.String name,
                          java.lang.String nit,
                          java.lang.String address,
                          java.lang.String phone,
                          java.lang.String assets,
                          Date dateOfConstitution,
                          java.lang.String type,
                          java.lang.String amountOfEmployees,
                          java.lang.String legalRepresentative,
                          int floors,
                          java.lang.String id,
                          int accreditedYears,
                          int nationalPositioningTest11Pro,
                          java.lang.String rectorName,
                          int educationalSector,
                          int studentsOfLowStratus,
                          int amountOfStudents)
        Description: The constructor of the class EducationalCompany.
        Pre: No one parameter can be null.
        Post: All attributes of the class are initialized.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the company.
        nit - A String that identifies the company.
        address - The company's correspondence address.
        phone - The contact phone number of the company.
        assets - the value of the company's assets in pesos.
        dateOfConstitution - The date of constitution of the company.
        type - The type of organization (The types of organizations that exist are specified in the constant TYPE).
        amountOfEmployees - The number of the company's employees.
        legalRepresentative - The name of the company's representative legal.
        floors - The number of floors of the company's building (it must be between 3 and 7).
        id - The registration number of approval before the Ministry of National Education.
        accreditedYears - The number of years accredited as a high-quality entity.
        nationalPositioningTest11Pro - National position according to exams saber11/Pro.
        rectorName - The name of the rector.
        educationalSector - A number that indicates the education sector (0 if it is high school and 1 if it is a university).
        studentsOfLowStratus - The number of active students stratum 1 and 2.
        amountOfStudents - The total number of active students.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateProCultureTax

        public java.lang.String calculateProCultureTax()
        Description: This method allows calculating the educational company's proculture tax.
        Specified by:
        calculateProCultureTax in interface ProCultureCalculator
        Returns:
        A message that indicates if the company must pay the tax or not and how much is the percentage of the tax.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Description: This method allows converting the company's attributes in a String.
